name: Bate Bola
description:
MoKooL Apps proudly presents Bate Bola! Now you can practice to be the next World Cup champion, all at your fingertips.

Bate Bola hits brings all the excitement of a World Cup game, and you are the star. The game is extremely addictive and you will want to play non-stop, hitting the ball on targets and trying to beat your record every time.

It was almost attaining its record but it was without lives? Hit the "Save Me" button and keep playing! Never lose a new record, "Save Me's" is here to help you whenever you need.

Download and play Bate Bola right now!
